statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialData;
SELECT id, date, profit FROM FinancialData WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT id, date, revenue, expenses FROM FinancialData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, profit FROM FinancialData WHERE expenses < 5000 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT date, expenses FROM FinancialData WHERE profit < 0;
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT date, revenue, expenses FROM FinancialData WHERE profit > 5000 ORDER BY profit DESC
SELECT id, profit FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY profit ASC
SELECT id, date, profit FROM FinancialData WHERE expenses < 2000 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM FinancialData WHERE expenses > 1000 AND (revenue - expenses) > 500 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT date, closing_price FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, volume FROM financial_data ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT predicted_closing_price, confidence_level FROM forecasts WHERE date = '2022-10-15' AND stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
SELECT * FROM forecasts WHERE confidence_level > 80 ORDER BY predicted_closing_price ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_data WHERE date = '2021-10-15'
SELECT stock_symbol, volume FROM financial_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT date, stock_symbol, predicted_closing_price FROM forecasts WHERE confidence_level > 85 ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_data JOIN forecasts ON financial_data.date = forecasts.date AND financial_data.stock_symbol = forecasts.stock_symbol
SELECT stock_symbol, AVG(closing_price) AS avg_closing_price FROM financial_data GROUP BY stock_symbol HAVING AVG(closing_price) > 50
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE expenses > 5000;
SELECT id, profit_margin FROM performance_metrics WHERE id <= 100;
SELECT * FROM forecasting_data WHERE sales_forecast < expenses_forecast ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, profit_margin, liquidity_ratio FROM performance_metrics WHERE profit_margin > 0.2 AND liquidity_ratio < 0.5;
SELECT date, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, profit_margin, liquidity_ratio FROM performance_metrics WHERE profit_margin > 0.2;
SELECT * FROM forecasting_data WHERE sales_forecast > expenses_forecast ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, revenue + expenses AS total_revenue FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT date, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT company_name, revenue, expenses FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses;
SELECT date, profitability FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT company_name, forecasted_revenue, forecasted_expenses FROM forecasts WHERE forecasted_revenue > forecasted_expenses LIMIT 5;
SELECT stock_symbol, trading_volume, stock_price FROM market_trends WHERE trading_volume > 100000 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE expenses > 10000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, profitability FROM performance_metrics WHERE profitability > 0.2 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT revenue, expenses, date FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY revenue DESC, expenses ASC;
SELECT forecasted_revenue, forecasted_expenses FROM forecasts WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT stock_symbol, trading_volume, stock_price FROM market_trends WHERE stock_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY trading_volume DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
SELECT date, roi, roe FROM financial_ratios WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, forecasted_profit FROM forecast_data ORDER BY forecasted_profit DESC;
SELECT date, liquidity_ratio, profitability_ratio FROM financial_metrics WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT company_name, eps, stock_price FROM performance_metrics WHERE eps > 2 AND stock_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY date DESC, revenue DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, profit FROM historical_data WHERE revenue > 1000000 ORDER BY profit DESC;
SELECT * FROM forecast_data WHERE forecasted_profit > forecasted_revenue ORDER BY forecasted_profit DESC;
SELECT date, company_name, roi, roe FROM financial_ratios WHERE roi > 0.2 AND roe > 0.15 ORDER BY roi DESC, roe DESC;
SELECT company_name, eps FROM performance_metrics WHERE eps < 10 ORDER BY eps ASC, company_name;
